Medium: Illustrated book with 22 lithographs, printed in black on chine appliqué, and 16 wood engravings and 5-page wood-engraved table of plates cut by Georges Aubert after Redon's designs, printed in black
Dimensions: Composition: various dimensions   Page: 17 5/16 x 13" (44 x 33 cm)
Title: The Temptation of Saint Anthony
Date: [1938], dated 1933 (lithographs executed 1896; wood engravings executed c. 1910)
